title: PI Controller Function Block
description: This function block implements a proportional-integral (PI) controller. It processes an input signal with a proportional gain (KP) and an integral gain (KI) while enforcing both upper and lower limits on the output signal. The block can be reset, which initializes internal variables.
name: FT_PIWL

input.name: IN
input.description: The input signal for the PI controller.

input.name: LIM_L
input.description: The lower limit for the output signal (default is -1E+38).

input.name: LIM_H
input.description: The upper limit for the output signal (default is 1E+38).

input.name: RST
input.description: A boolean flag to reset the internal state.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output signal from the PI controller.

output.name: LIM
output.description: Indicates whether the output signal is within the defined limits.
